text: A dissolved limited partnership that has completed winding up may deliver to the Mayor for filing a statement of termination that states:
historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29-101.01.

Uniform Law:

This section is based on § 203 of the Uniform Limited Partnership Act (2001 Act). See Vol. 6A , Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.

DC CODE § 29-702.03

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: The name of the limited partnership;
The date of filing of its initial certificate of limited partnership; and
Any other information as determined by the general partners filing the statement or by a person appointed pursuant to § 29-708.03(c) or (d).

subchapter.text: Formation; Certificate of Limited Partnership and Other Filings.
